motions.description: move the cursor forward to the start of the next word
move the cursor forward to the start of the next word (words can contain punctuation)
move the cursor forward to the end of the next word
move the cursor forward to the end of the next word (words can contain punctuation)
move the cursor backwards to the start of the previous word
move the cursor backwards to the start of the previous word (words can contain punctuation)
move the cursor to the start of the line
move the cursor to the first non-blank character on the current line
move the cursor to the last character on the current line
write the contents of the file to disk
write the contents of the file to disk and exit
quit. If there are unsaved changes, then this command will fail.
Force quit. Ignore unsaved changes and quit without saving.
